snippet.title: We Are OFK - E3 2021 Story Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
From indie pop band OFK: the story follows the lives of four friends in their 20s as they attempt to break into the music business, fall in and out of love, and figure out how to pay rent and make art in Los Angeles. Wishlist Now on Steam! http://ofk.cool/steam

We Are OFK, the new interactive series!
•   Play on Steam: http://ofk.cool/steam
•   Stream "Follow/Unfollow" by OFK everywhere: http://ofk.cool
•   Twitter: https://twitter.com/OFKband
•   Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ofkband
•   Website: http://ofk.cool

Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdUdli03uuvOHU1XZT0QuKw?sub_confirmation=1

Trailer Edited by Anna Gustafson

"Follow/Unfollow"
Written and Produced by - Luna Shadows & Thomas Powers
Performed by - OFK
Mixed by - Beatriz Artola
Mastered by - Jett Galindo
Vocals by - Teddy Dief
